snippet: Deborah Lee James, hit with a scandal weeks after starting her new job, has been praised by some Pentagon officials for seizing an opportunity to practice greater openness.
abstract: Air Force Secretary Deborah Lee James, confronted with nuclear missile officer cheating scandal weeks after starting her new job in Dec 2013, has been praised by some Pentagon officials for seizing an opportunity to practice greater openness.
lead_paragraph: Deborah Lee James, hit with a scandal weeks after starting her new job, has been praised by some Pentagon officials for seizing an opportunity to practice greater openness.

headline.main: For New Air Force Secretary, a Baptism by Fire
headline.print_headline: For New Air Force Secretary, a Baptism by Fire
